content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <feed xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"> <title>Scholarly works - Engineering - Energy, Fluid Mechanics and Turbomachinery</title> <link href="http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/226463" rel="alternate"/> <subtitle/> <id>http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/226463</id> <updated>2015-03-13T00:11:52Z</updated> <dc:date>2015-03-13T00:11:52Z</dc:date> <entry> <title>Flow Field Results of the Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner Using Laser Doppler Anemometer</title> <link href="http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/243259" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Zhou, Ruigang</name> </author> <author> <name>Sweeney, Mark</name> </author> <author> <name>Hochgreb, Simone</name> </author> <id>http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/243259</id> <updated>2013-07-25T14:29:26Z</updated> <published>2012-06-08T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Flow Field Results of the Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner Using Laser Doppler Anemometer Zhou, Ruigang; Sweeney, Mark; Hochgreb, Simone A series of flow fields generated by a turbulent methane/air stratified swirl burner are investigated using laser Doppler anemometer (LDA) to obtain the velocities in axial, radial and tangential directions. All mean and RMS of the LDA velocity results are supplied along with a report describing the experimental methodology, data processing routines and the data format. </summary> <dc:date>2012-06-08T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>A Tool for the Spectral Analysis of the Laser Doppler Anemometer Data of the Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner</title> <link href="http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/243258" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Zhou, Ruigang</name> </author> <author> <name>Balusamy, Saravanan</name> </author> <author> <name>Hochgreb, Simone</name> </author> <id>http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/243258</id> <updated>2013-07-25T14:30:21Z</updated> <published>2012-06-08T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">A Tool for the Spectral Analysis of the Laser Doppler Anemometer Data of the Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner Zhou, Ruigang; Balusamy, Saravanan; Hochgreb, Simone A series of flow fields generated by a turbulent methane/air stratified swirl burner are investigated using laser Doppler anemometer (LDA). The LDA provides flow field measurements with comparatively high temporal resolutions. However, processing of the power spectral energy density (PSD) and autocorrelation functions (ACF) of the flow velocity by LDA is complicated by the random, intermittent nature of the LDA signal caused by random arrival of particles at the measuring volume. A tool is developed to overcome this difficulty and the preliminary results are presented in the present report. </summary> <dc:date>2012-06-08T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Technical Drawings of Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner (SwB)</title> <link href="http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/241609" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Sweeney, Mark</name> </author> <author> <name>Barlow, Robert</name> </author> <author> <name>Hochgreb, Simone</name> </author> <id>http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/241609</id> <updated>2012-02-24T09:48:16Z</updated> <published>2008-01-01T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Technical Drawings of Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner (SwB) Sweeney, Mark; Barlow, Robert; Hochgreb, Simone Technical drawings (plan, elevation etc) of components in the Cambridge Stratified Swirl Burner. All images are to scale </summary> <dc:date>2008-01-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Cambridge Stratified Slot Burner Data</title> <link href="http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/226470" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Sweeney, Mark</name> </author> <author> <name>Hochgreb, Simone</name> </author> <author> <name>Barlow, Rob</name> </author> <id>http://www.repository.cam.ac.uk:80/handle/1810/226470</id> <updated>2013-07-25T13:27:36Z</updated> <published>2010-09-23T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Cambridge Stratified Slot Burner Data Sweeney, Mark; Hochgreb, Simone; Barlow, Rob Experimental datasets from weakly turbulent methane\\air v-flames for a premixed case (fs1), moderately stratified case (fs4) and highly stratified case (fs6). Line measurements of temperature and major species concentrations are supplied, along with simultaneous cross planar OH-PLIF images where the axis of intersection is coincident with the line measurement axis. The OH-PLIF images have been corrected for background, laser beam intensity profile, and have been normalized between zero and one. </summary> <dc:date>2010-09-23T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> </feed>
